4.eng-name: The Book of Ghusl and Tayammum

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibrahim bin Muhammad bin Al-Muntashir that his father said:"I heard Ibn 'Umar say: 'I would rather wake up in the morning covered in tar than wake up and enter Ihram with the smell of perfume coming from me.' I entered upon 'Aishah and told her what he had said, and she said: 'I put perfume on the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) and he went round to all his wives, then in the morning he entered Ihram

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا تَطَيَّبَ وَاغْتَسَلَ وَبَقِيَ أَثَرُ الطِّيبِ
chapter.eng-name: If A Person Applies Perfume And Performs Ghusl, And The Trace Of The Perfume Remains
